item.combat_reborn.quiver.desc: Used to store large amounts of arrows which can be accessed directly by ranged weapons
enchantment.combat_reborn.cleaving.desc: Increases both damage dealt and the duration for which shields are disabled
enchantment.combat_reborn.parry.desc: Reduces the shield strength penalty on a successful parry, and adds a chance for successful parries to block crushing blows
enchantment.combat_reborn.stagger.desc: Parrying an attack damages and applies both weakness and slowness to the attacker
enchantment.combat_reborn.dueling.desc: Increases shield strength recovery provided when attacking
text.autoconfig.combat_reborn.title: Combat Reborn
text.autoconfig.combat_reborn.option.gen: Whether custom modified attack damage, speed & reach values should be used for many vanilla and modded weapons. These can be individually configured at the bottom of this file
Whether Axes should use the new Cleaving enchantment, as opposed to Sharpness. Cleaving increases both attack damage and the shield disable duration
Whether the Shield overhaul should be enabled, which includes new mechanics such as parrying and a strength meter. Also includes 4 new enchantments - Parry, Endurance, Stagger & Dueling
Whether the Shield Strength overlay should be rendered as a hotbar or crosshair element
The time, in game ticks, before a Shield is considered to be blocking attacks. Defaults to 0 for an instant response, with a maximum of 5 (identical to vanilla)
Whether Quivers should be added to the game
Whether slight tweaks should be made to the performance of ranged weapons in order to better suit the introduction of Quivers
Whether a reworked saturation, hunger and exhaustion system should be used
The amount of points required to be considered low on hunger. Defaults to 6, like vanilla
Whether soups & stews should stack to 16
Whether taking damage from another entity should cancel the consumption of an item
Whether snowballs and eggs should inflict knockback
End Reborn integration adds a +1 bonus to Netherite tool damage for consistency with End Reborn's changes
Enderscape integration balances Rubble Shields separately
